Welcome to AsyncNT's documentation!
===================================

**AsyncNT** is an asynchronous way to fetch data from
`nitrotype <https://nitrotype.com>`_.

Features
========

* Asyncio support
* Access to the Nitro Type API
* Rate limit of 10 requests per second
* Cache to speed up requests

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

.. toctree::
   
   usage
   classes
   exceptions
